text: phwk khea midi thxngtheiyw pi tam phændin dxk hrux læw phicarna du wa banplay khxng prachachati nı yukh kxn hna phwk khea pen chen dı khea hela nan mi phlang thi khemkhæng kwa phwk khea læa di thing rxngrxy wi makmay læ wxallxhˌ kdi thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea dwy khwam phid khxng phwk khea læa mimi phu dı ca chwy pkpxng phwk khea hı phn ca kxallxhˌ di
